Topic modeling

Feb 24, 2017

Topic modeling is way of identifying patterns (topics) in a collection of documents.

This is only a proof of concept to check out the performance of the LDA algorithm at MLlib based on the posts:

  • Topic modeling with LDA: MLlib meets GraphX
  • Large Scale Topic Modeling: Improvements to LDA on Apache Spark

Data

The text used to this proof was extracted from the BBC Mundo web page using Beautiful Soup, a Python library for web scrapping. The code used is available in the BBC scraping iPython notebook.

Proof of concept

Iâ€™ve use the Apache Zeppelin environment to run the experimentation. This is a very useful tool that provides built-in Apache Spark integration.

All the original code can be viewed in this Zeppelin notebook. Also this Updated notebook uses the LDA version included in the MLlib DataFrame based API.
